preface.title: Introduction
preface.para: Freedict is an small organisation of people who together oversee the publication of Translating Dictionaries. These translating dictionaries are currently output in a format that works with Dictd and Serpento dictionary servers. They are also archived in a flexible XML TEI XML format that allows for further use and development.

The content of the dictionaries is left up to individual developers, we can't speak every language on the planet and so rely on the contributing writerscontributing writers and users to produce qualityquality , useful dictionaries. We can however, try to ensure that the dictionaries are formatted and organised correctly, are as easy as practicable to produce, and will install on free operating systems.

Your probably reading this to get an idea of what is involved in producing a translating dictionary. The approach taken with these HOWTOs is task orientated, we hope you can just jump in at the point you are at and continue forward.
